mapper.select: select notice_Num, notice_Title, notice_Content, notice_Date from notice order by notice_Num desc
select notice_Num, notice_Title, notice_Content, notice_Date from notice where notice_Num = #{notice_Num}
mapper.insert: insert into faq (faq_Title, faq_Kinds, faq_Content, faq_Id) values (#{faq_Title}, #{faq_Kinds}, #{faq_Content}, #{faq_Id})
mapper.select: select goods_Code, goods_Name, goods_Des, goods_Pic, goods_Date from goods where seller_Id = #{seller_Id} order by goods_Code desc
select tals_Code, tals_Title, tals_Kinds, tals_Kinds_2, tals_Date, tals_Id, tals_Content, tals_Price, tals_Term, Phone_Num from talent_s where tals_Id = #{seller_Id} order by tals_Code desc
select trade_Code, goods_Code, seller_Id, buyer_Id, trade_State from trade where seller_Id = #{seller_Id} AND trade_State = 2 order by trade_Code desc

select trade_T_Code, talent_Code, seller_Id, buyer_Id, trade_T_State, talent_Title, trade_T_Date, buyer_Phone, talent_Kinds,talent_Kinds_2 from trade_t where seller_Id = #{seller_Id} AND trade_T_State = 2 order by trade_T_Code desc
select goods_Code, trade_State from trade where buyer_Id = #{goodsb_Id} order by goods_Code desc
select trade_T_Code, talent_Code, trade_T_State from trade_t where buyer_Id = #{buyer_Id} order by trade_T_Code desc
select goods_Code, trade_State from trade where buyer_Id = #{goodsb_Id} order by goods_Code desc
select trade_Code, goods_Code, seller_Id, buyer_Id, trade_State from trade where goods_Code = #{goods_Code}
select trade_T_Code, talent_Code, seller_Id, buyer_Id, trade_T_State, talent_Title, trade_T_Date, buyer_Phone, talent_Kinds, talent_Kinds_2 from trade_t where trade_T_Code = #{trade_T_Code}
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_Code, review_Content, review_Sta, review_Writer, review_Goods, review_Trader) values (review_seq.nextval, #{review_Content}, #{review_Sta}, #{review_Writer}, #{review_Goods}, #{review_Trader})

insert into review_t (rev_T_Code, rev_T_Content, rev_T_Sta, rev_T_Writer, rev_T_Kinds, rev_T_Kinds_2, rev_T_Trader) values (review_t_seq.nextval, #{rev_T_Content}, #{rev_T_Sta}, #{rev_T_Writer}, #{rev_T_Kinds}, #{rev_T_Kinds_2}, #{rev_T_Trader})
mapper.select: select review_Code, review_Content, review_Sta, review_Writer, review_Date, review_Goods, review_Trader from review where review_Writer = #{Id} order by review_Code desc
select rev_T_Code, rev_T_Content, rev_T_Sta, rev_T_Writer, rev_T_Date, rev_T_Kinds, rev_T_Kinds_2, rev_T_Trader from review_t where rev_T_Writer =#{Id} order by rev_T_Code desc
